  • public class TestNGEngineForCommonParamsAllSuites
extends AbstractTestNGEngine
    TestNGEngine Class generates new Xml Suites at runtime for each client for each module suite from existing Main Xml Suite file (testng.xml) provided Implements ITestNGEngine Interface
    Author:
    nv092106
